conbody.p: To view the results of runs scheduled for Anlytics and models, perform the following:

ol.li: Select Scheduler Results in the left panel to open the Scheduler window.

Select the Analytics Schedules tab.
The Models and Anlytics scheduled to run are listed.

Click the checkbox besides the model or analytic of interest and click . The Results for the schedule:<Name of Analytic> window displays. The screenshot below shows the list of scheduled runs completed for the analytic "testschedule-analytics3".
Select a scheduled job from the list and click . The Execution result for Model: <Name of Model> displays.
Click Close to close the execution results view.
